thread.title: Uganda: NSE Links Up With Uganda Share System
thread.title_full: Uganda: NSE Links Up With Uganda Share System

title: Uganda: NSE Links Up With Uganda Share System
text:
Nigeria: Sustainability for Capital Markets 
The EASEA said that investors trading across the Uganda Securities Exchange (USE) and the Nairobi Securities Exchange (NSE) have started using the system. 
"Investors in the Ugandan and the Kenyan market have started accessing securities through this arrangement," said ESEA in a statement. 
The USE said that the bourse has begun dematerialisation of shares to increase efficiency in trading. Uganda
